chat.noDocumentsReferenced: No documents were referenced for this response.
chat.title: Chat
chat.placeholder: Ask Koda anything about your documents...
chat.welcomeSubtitle: Ask me anything about your documents
chat.welcomeDescription: Your intelligent document assistant. Upload documents, ask questions, and get instant answers.
chat.suggestedQuestion2: Find all invoices from last month
chat.suggestedQuestion3: What are the key points in my contracts?
chat.noMessagesSubtitle: Start a conversation by asking a question about your documents
chat.confidenceReasoning: Confidence based on source quality and relevance
welcomeMessages: Hey {name}, what do you need?
What are you looking for today?
What do you want to find?
What do you need from Koda?
Tell me what you need now.
What should I pull up?
What do you want to open?
Type what you're looking for.
What can I find for you?
What do you need to see?
What's on your mind, {name}?
What do you want to check?
What answer do you need now?
What should we work on first?
Which document do you need now?
What do you need clarity on?
What can I surface for you?
What should I look up first?
What's blocking you right now?
What do you need to decide?
What's the next question, {name}?
What do you need in seconds?
Tell me the topic. I'll search.
Tell me what you're working on.
Drop your question. I'll handle it.
What do you want Koda to find?
What do you want to understand?
What do you need from your docs?
What's urgent for you right now?
What should Koda help with first?
Okay {name}, what do you need next?
